net.floodlightcontroller.restserver

接口 RestletRoutable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ACLWebRoutable, CoreWebRoutable, DeviceRoutable, DHCPServerWebRoutable, FirewallWebRoutable, LearningSwitchWebRoutable, LinkDiscoveryWebRoutable, LoadBalancerWebRoutable, PerfWebRoutable, QoSoverLLDPWebRoutable, RoutingWebRoutable, StaticEntryWebRoutable, StaticFlowEntryWebRoutable, StaticFlowWebRoutable, StaticWebRoutable, StorageWebRoutable, SwitchStatisticsWebRoutable, TopologyWebRoutable, VirtualNetworkWebRoutable

    public interface RestletRoutable
    Register a set of REST resources with the central controller

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String basePath()
      Get the base path URL where the router should be registered
      org.restlet.Restlet getRestlet(org.restlet.Context context)
      Get the restlet that will map to the resources

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRestlet

        org.restlet.Restlet getRestlet(org.restlet.Context context)
        Get the restlet that will map to the resources
        参数:
        context - the context for constructing the restlet
        返回:
        the restlet

      • basePath

        java.lang.String basePath()
        Get the base path URL where the router should be registered
        返回:
        the base path URL where the router should be registered
